summary: This bill, the Research Advancing to Market Production for Innovators Act, focuses on improving the Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) and Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) programs. It aims to enhance commercialization efforts by including commercialization expertise in peer review, improving phase flexibility, designating technology commercialization officials within federal agencies, and expanding technical and business assistance available to awardees. The bill also mandates I-Corps participation for relevant agencies, requires an annual commercialization impact assessment, and establishes a prioritized patent examination program for SBIR/STTR recipients through an interagency agreement with the USPTO.
